Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement Phase 1 database and core backend infrastructure

Phase 1: Database & Core Backend

Database Layer:
- Enhanced Prisma schema with soft delete support \(deletedAt fields\)
- Added indexes for query optimization
- Created comprehensive repositories \(meeting, user, organization, transcript\)
- Implemented pagination utilities \(offset and cursor-based\)
- Added full-text search utilities for PostgreSQL
- Created transaction utilities with retry logic

API Layer:
- Implemented full Meeting CRUD with filtering and pagination
- Added meeting endpoints: /upcoming, /recent, /stats
- Added transcript, summary, and action-items endpoints
- Created rate limiting middleware \(standard, strict, expensive\)
- Added Zod-based request validation middleware
- Integrated real database connectivity in health checks

Job Queue Infrastructure:
- Set up BullMQ queues \(transcription, summarization, webhook, calendar_sync\)
- Created type-safe job data interfaces
- Added queue management and statistics functions

Testing:
- Created comprehensive API test suite with mocked database
- All 29 tests passing \(18 API, 11 web\)
- Added database repository test files

Documentation:
- Updated API reference with new endpoints
- Created PHASE_1_COMPLETE.md handoff document

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
